title: H E L P  please ;-; FPS Problem
body: Hi i have a gaming laptop (MSigp 62 leopard pro) with a nvidia 950m as graphic card. When i started i had 150 to 200 fps in very high graph now i got 20 to 30 fps in medium graph! Can someone help me please. Is there anyway that i can get back my 150 fps? Sometime it can drop to 5-10 fps for 5 sec

replies.body: You might have some outdated drivers causing you to suffer some frame loss, even more so if you had to reduce your settings.  Try out the steps in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune things up.  It should do the trick!
